subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 25 saves Thursday for his 97th career shutout and Brian Rolston scored in the Devils’ 1-0 victory over the Thrashers in Atlanta.
snippet: Martin Brodeur made 25 saves Thursday for his 97th career shutout and Brian Rolston scored in the Devils’ 1-0 victory over the Thrashers in Atlanta.
